description: Movie and TV show information including title, year, runtime, and genres
use_cases: Find movies by year, genre, or runtime
Analyze trends in movie production over time
Compare movie vs TV series statistics

columns.primaryTitle: Main title used for the film/show
columns.endYear: TV series end year (NULL for movies)

data_quality_notes: startYear can be NULL for unreleased titles
runtimeMinutes is NULL for ~30% of entries
genres field is a comma-separated string, use LIKE for filtering
isAdult is integer 0 or 1, not boolean
